attributes.action: allow district nurses to have flashing lights and sirens on cars (similar to those on on call DR's cars) to allow them to attend to people promptly if there is an emergency, or there is a terminally ill person in pain or distress requireing medications or other nursing interventions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on call district nurses have no way of attending to their patients in an emergency.  this is wrong!
